name: Authority
description:
Long ago , a wizard came from afar to bring peace in a war time, sealing the enemies underground, he was wielding the Authorities, the best weapons in the entire world.

To prevent anyone from getting the Authorities, the old wizard built a temple and placed the scepters on it's summit.

Decades passed, and the Authorities are still waiting for their next master.

While nobody succeeded to get those precious weapons , the worst happened...

Game discord server : https://discord.gg/Xv5EffC
